experience.title: Co-Founder & CEO
experience.description: At Robylon, we help companies automate customer support using AI. We support all 4 channels - Tickets/Emails, Chats, Social and Voice. Our solution helps companies:1. Automate over 80% of customer queries2. Improve resolution times by over 90%3. Reduce costs by over 30% We are so confident in our solution, we only charge per resolved query.

experience.title: Co-Founder & CEO
experience.description: At OneWorldNation (OWN), we were building a casual gaming ecosystem on top of the blockchain, for the developing markets. A mobile first platform that offered a mix of traditional games like Ludo, alongwith modern casino games like Crash.In a little less than 18 months, we built 7 games and acquired ~100k users across 8 countries (India, Philippines, Brazil). We scaled to ~$2 mil ARR, with ~70% revenue coming from India. With the new GST law on real money gaming introduced by the Government of India in August 2023, it was no longer viable to run the venture profitably. Hence, we decided to pivot.
experience.description_html: At OneWorldNation (OWN), we were building a casual gaming ecosystem on top of the blockchain, for the developing markets. A mobile first platform that offered a mix of traditional games like Ludo, alongwith modern casino games like Crash.In a little less than 18 months, we built 7 games and acquired ~100k users across 8 countries (India, Philippines, Brazil). We scaled to ~$2 mil ARR, with ~70% revenue coming from India. With the new GST law on real money gaming introduced by the Government of India in August 2023, it was no longer viable to run the venture profitably. Hence, we decided to pivot.

experience.title: Co-Founder & CEO
experience.description: Aasaanjobs was started with an objective to solve the entry level blue collar hiring in India. India has one of the youngest population in the world and a technology platform to enable the jobs marketplace is what we set out to build.Over the 5 years journey at the company, we expanded to over 30 cities in India, catering to several job roles - Sales, Delivery boys, Warehouse executives etc. We worked with 50+ enterprises and over 400 mid-market companies in India, helping them hire ~40,000 people every year.We scaled to ~$50 mil ARR and sold the company in an all cash deal to OLX (a Prosus group Company) in December 2018.
experience.description_html: Aasaanjobs was started with an objective to solve the entry level blue collar hiring in India. India has one of the youngest population in the world and a technology platform to enable the jobs marketplace is what we set out to build.Over the 5 years journey at the company, we expanded to over 30 cities in India, catering to several job roles - Sales, Delivery boys, Warehouse executives etc. We worked with 50+ enterprises and over 400 mid-market companies in India, helping them hire ~40,000 people every year.We scaled to ~$50 mil ARR and sold the company in an all cash deal to OLX (a Prosus group Company) in December 2018.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: I was working on the Equities desk for the Hong Kong market.- Transaction Cost Analysis for Algorithmic Trading clients on the Hong Kong desk- Analysis and performance optimization of Smart Order Router Tool for the Indian market- Sentiment analysis of technology stocks trading on the NASDAQ- Analysis and automation of performance reports of various trading algorithms used at the Hong Kong market.

volunteer_experience.info: 🏢 The Akanksha Foundation is a non-profit organisation with a mission to provide children from low-income communities with a high-quality education, enabling them to maximize their potential and transform their lives.🧑‍🏫 I volunteered at the Foundation for a year, while I was at IIT. I was primarily teaching Maths and English to a class of 30 kids in the slum areas of Mumbai. Most of these kids attended government schools where the quality of education was not upto the mark.
